hotels.title: Five-Star Kuching Sophistication near Sarawak River with Four Restaurants
hotels.description: Soak up the vibrant energy of 'Cat City' with a chic stay at this Pullman sanctuary, nestled in the heart of Kuching, tucked away within Malaysian Borneo. A stone's throw from the Hills Shopping Mall, the hotel's elegantly appointed rooms, paird with panoramic city and river vistas, take advantage of the property's prime location in the Kuching Golden Triangle. Tuck into pan-Asian cuisine at Puzzle, indulge in authentic Chinese fare with a modern twist at Nu Er Hung and savour bakery delights at Café des Arts. Later, head to Déjà Vu and sip from an impressive collection of wines, beers and cocktails.

hotels.title: Intimate Malaysia Hideaway near Kuching City
hotels.description: Hidden at the foot of Mount Santubong near the alluring Malaysian Borneo capital of Kuching, Cove 55 is the place to completely retreat from the rest of the world. A former holiday home turned intimate hideaway with ranking as Tripadvisor’s #1 property in Kuching, this boutique escape is home to 28 light-filled rooms. Take a stroll through the perfectly manicured gardens and you'll find pristine white exteriors, tribal-inspired luxury and a 30-metre infinity swimming pool suspended above the South China Sea. The water is gloriously refreshing - you'll be tempted to soak until sunset. Then it's up to Kechala Restaurant & Bar for tantalising dishes infused with Sarawakian flavours, or perhaps the Cove Bar perched on the Sea Deck for a mixologist-crafted cocktail. Less than a 40-minute drive from Kuching City, this secluded spot is somewhere you can discover pristine nature and local culture effortlessly, while away an afternoon in the Library and fall asleep each night to the sound of waves.
